name: Pac-Harold adventures!
description:
What is Pac-Harold?
Pac-Harold is a game inspired by Pac-Man, a retro pixel game where you have to gather the hearts to gain score!
You can also grab a sword and defeat the Ghost-Reids to get extra scores!

How to play Pac-Harold?
Use Arrows to change directions, W-A-S-D also works!

Credits

Harold Game Jam
